# 1971 war

The 1971 war may refer to:
* Bangladesh Liberation War, 1971 civil war in Pakistan initiated by East Pakistan (now Bangladesh) separatists supported by India
** Indo-Pakistani war of 1971, armed conflict in the later stages of the war
See also
* Indiaâ€“Pakistan border skirmishes (disambiguation)

## 1971 War

#REDIRECT Indo-Pakistani war of 1971
